name: PNG - European Union Business Council
goal:
To promote trade between European countries and Papua New Guinea.

To assist companies and individuals from European countries to transact business and invest in PNG.

To assist companies and individuals from Papua New Guinea to transaction business and invest in European countries
interests: Consumers, Culture, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, External Relations, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Sport, Trade
euInitiatives: European Union - PNG Fair Trade Agreement
